[[inst_hl_sbi]]
==== HL.SBI

*Syntax:* hl.sbi SrcD, [SrcR, simm]

*Description:* Long immediate variant supporting extended address range (48-bit).

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_sbi.svg[HL.SBI encoding,width=800]

*Group:* STA/LONG
